This test checks that an outline change is correctly repainted.

There should be a 5px green outline below.

Lorem Ipsum
(GraphicsLayer
  (bounds 800.00 600.00)
  (children 1
    (GraphicsLayer
      (bounds 800.00 600.00)
      (contentsOpaque 1)
      (drawsContent 1)
      (repaint rects
        (rect 792.00 16.00 5.00 97.00)
        (rect 8.00 108.00 789.00 5.00)
        (rect 8.00 88.00 784.00 20.00)
        (rect 8.00 83.00 789.00 30.00)
        (rect 30.00 88.00 762.00 20.00)
        (rect 30.00 83.00 767.00 30.00)
        (rect 30.00 88.00 762.00 20.00)
        (rect 30.00 83.00 767.00 30.00)
      )
    )
  )
)
